title-group.article-title: Hybrid Wind/Photovoltaic/Diesel System Research at the University of Massachusetts

abstract.p: The past decade has yielded significant developments in the design, analysis and installation of hybrid (wind/photovoltaic (PV)/diesel) power systems. Tim paper presents a summary of recent progress on this subject in the United States with emphasis on the analytical and experimental work carried out at the University of Massachusetts. Topics discussed here include: 1) system configuration and hardware, 2) modeling and design tools, and 3) recent applications.
